sidenav_page.add: Button with options to create a folder or feature.
sidenav_page.home: We have on this section the co.meta tutorial, help and documentation.
sidenav_page.data_driven_sidenav: Execution of tests based on the variables provided by the excel sheet
sidenav_page.variables_sidenav: In this section, we can add or edit variables among other functionalities
sidenav_page.recent: The last tests you have run

feature.created_dialog_content: The feature {{ data.feature_name }} has been created successfully. Do you want to view it now?
feature.name: Name
feature.email_panel_description: Edit email address, subject and body
feature.email_address_placeholder: Email address, use tab to separate emails.
feature.email_subject_placeholder: Subject. Leave it empty for a default subject.
feature.email_body_placeholder: Message Body. Leave it empty for a default message with info about the feature.
feature.file_no_files: Currently this department has no files, upload one by clicking upload button.
feature.browser_panel_description: Select which browsers will run this feature
feature.browser_no_clouds: No clouds are available. Please go see our
feature.browser_favourites_hint: Click on the star icon to add a favorite.
feature.browser_swipe_hint: Swipe left or right to view more browsers (if available)
feature.step_panel_description: Edit the steps for the current feature (applies to all selected browsers)
feature.schedule_panel_description: When the feature will be executed
feature.schedule_help: How to format a cron schedule (click)
feature.schedule_timezone: Note: Your feature will be scheduled in UTC timezone.
feature.schedule_timezone_nextline: Here are some executions (in '{{ timezone }}' timezone) based on the crontab expression:
feature.schedule_error: Error: Found error while parsing crontab expression, please check.
feature.schedule_div_help_tittle: How to format a cron schedule
feature.schedule_div_help_fields: A cron calendar is made up of 5 fields:
feature.schedule_div_help_five_minute_content: It can be a specific minute or every few minutes.
feature.schedule_div_help_five_values:
• * Any value
  • , Multiple values
  • - Range of values
  • / Step values (every certain amount)
feature.schedule_div_help_five_hour_content: It can be a specific hour or every few hours.
feature.schedule_div_help_five_daymonth_content: Day (month): It can be a specific day number or a range with a hyphen.
feature.schedule_div_help_five_month_content: Month: It can be a specific month number, a range or a comma separated number list.
feature.schedule_div_help_five_dayweek_content: Day (week): It only can be a shorthand for day name.
feature.schedule_div_help_visit_page: To test your cron schedules, get more examples and/or learn more visit

main_view.explanation:
This screen shows the results of your testruns.

Once you have more then 10 results, co.meta will show you a beautiful linechart with execution times and more.
main_view.results_template:
Please execute your first feature clicking the blue run-button.


If you just added a feature and it's executing now you will have to wait until it's finished.


These results are reloaded automatically.
main_view.options_vuln_net_tooltip: Refer to the step reports to view vulnerable headers in the network responses.

data_driven_runs.no_tests: There are no Data Driven Tests as of now, please create a new Data Driven test.

data_driven_execution.title: Overview of Data Driven Tests
data_driven_execution.warning: Selecting Default department will make all the files you upload visible to everyone, use it with caution!
data_driven_execution.no_files: Currently this department has no files, upload one by clicking upload button.
data_driven_execution.generating_file: Generating file to download, please be patient.
data_driven_execution.downloading: Generating file to download, please be patient.
data_driven_execution.snackbar_error: Please review the data and try again.

columns.id_feature: Feature Result ID + Step Result ID

data_driven_executed_and_stop.dialog_content_execute: The data driven test for file {{ data.file_name }} is being executed, would you like to view the results now?
data_driven_executed_and_stop.title_stop: The data-driven execution has been successfully stopped
data_driven_executed_and_stop.dialog_content_stop: The data-driven execution with ID {{ data.run_id }} has been successfully stopped. A total of {{ data.test_count }} test(s) was terminated.

data_driven.data_driven_button: Execution of tests based on the variables provided by the excel sheet

columns.name: Name
columns.name_special_characters: Special characters and space are not allowed.

edit_variables.environment_no_variables: This environment has no variables yet.
edit_variables.snackbar_change_order_variable: Please save changes in order to edit another variable.

edit_feature.depends_on_other_feature: If enabled, only a third feature can run this feature
edit_feature.send_mail: If enabled, a new section will be displayed for sending the results to the desired email address.
edit_feature.record_video: Every time the feature is executed, a video will be recorded
edit_feature.network_logging: Enable this option to record network responses, including analysis of vulnerable headers
edit_feature.generate_dataset: Create a dataset from your web application
edit_feature.continue_on_failure_global: If enabled, the feature's steps will continue even in the presence of errors; if disabled, individual step settings take precedence
edit_feature.explanation: Enabling this option allows other users to help you on this feature
edit_feature.edit_variable: In this section, we can add or edit variables among other functionalities
edit_feature.default_template: If Checked, then please provide your custom email template, which can be used for creating customized e-Mails, e.g. only containing screenshot. The default is false - to not change the actual behavior customers are using
edit_feature.attach_pdf: If Checked, PDF test result will be attached within the email, Other wise email without PDF will be sent. Useful when sending email with customized template

need_help.can_help: Enabling this option allows you to assist on features marked with "Ask for help"
need_help.tooltip: This feature is asking for help
need_help.explanation: Enabling this option allows other users to help you on this feature

websockets.Timeout: Timed out searching for container with browser context.

user.tour_description: In co.meta you can learn about features interactive using the virtual tour guide. The virtual tour guide will show you around and explain step by step the how's and where's. Move your mouse over the tour buttons to see a short description.
user.webhooks_desc: Integrating co.meta with your preferred tools empowers you to optimize your development process. By seamlessly connecting Co.Meta, you can accelerate project completion, implement continuous testing practices, and effectively share quality updates with your entire department.

continue_on_failure.tooltip: This checkbox is disabled because Continue on failure is already enabled on a top item.

save: Marks the current item as saved.
unsave: Unmarks the current item as saved.

tooltips.delete_templates_with_features: If checked, the template images of each result will also be deleted
tooltips.variables_requires: Please select a department and environment to edit variables
tooltips.latest_browser: The latest stable version of this browser will be used automatically
tooltips.invalid_edit_form: We found errors in the form, please fix them before saving
tooltips.step_timeout_ignored: Timeout is ignored for this step.
tooltips.step_timeout: Set maximum timeout after which this step will be forced to stop.

you_sure.delete_item_title: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
you_sure.quit_title: Are you sure you want to quit?
you_sure.remove_all: Are you sure you want to remove all the steps?
you_sure.decrypt_title: Are you sure you want to decrypt this variable?
you_sure.decrypt_desc: Decrypting a variable will reset the environment variable value.
you_sure.budget_exceeded_desc: The feature you are about to run will exceed your configured budget. Do you want to continue?
you_sure.budget_ahead_desc: The feature you are about to run will likely exceed your configured budget. Do you want to continue?
you_sure.move_feature: You are attempting to move feature to different department, environment variables that the feature in question is currently using, will no longer be usable. Do you want to continue?
